Articles.Content: I appreciated your comment earlier as well!
10/10 100 outta 100 best user best user.
...led by the incredible Dr. Kaboom!
Whether you're a region, a potato, or just a user on the KSP forums people will always recognize you for being pure gold.
What a fab signature!
A rising craft builder with great ideas, and a major participating part of the ksp forums!
A user with a lot of chutzpah, and some really great creations!
A user with a cute profile pic who likes to welcome new people to the forums.

A user with a cute profile pic who likes to welcome new people to the forums.

I just had the same thing in mind, a compliment to you alphasus (and Dman797 for the welcoming work) for recognizing the same as me .
A pretty sweet spinning orb of awesomeness. We all recognize it and love it!
Never seen you, but your avatar is cool, and I hope we see each other later on
Again: Best. Username. EVAR.
Same to you. You have one unique username, and I like your sig.
Ok, so I got "mad" at you for piggybacking on the SCA, but that's not fair to you: you built it. Nice piece of work, especially in <.90!
I like dogs.

Ok, so I got "mad" at you for piggybacking on the SCA, but that's not fair to you: you built it. Nice piece of work, especially in <.90!

Mad? When? And.. thanks

Dark Junior, you created the game War of Insanity (I think), and even though it was closed down by moderators, you and Sampa continued to play it even though it took lots of forum hopping.
Your profile picture is an amazing example of technology. Also, you are a very intelligent and creative poster.
A possibly great person with original title, picture and name.

Mad? When? And.. thanks

A while ago in the "Ban the User Above You" Thread.

I love the twitter name, it's like mine: @idontwantone

There's a pun in your name that I haven't quite nailed down yet...

...Does that count?
Wow, just wow it's Xan :hailSampagirlfriend: xDr
Your next post not here will be 700, congratulations!
You're probably the first person I ever knew on the forums, way before I even joined.. Also love that gif!
You are the person who I have complimented the most here. Nice job!
You're a very kind poster, and humorous as well (Your response in "What's the worst that can happen?" About Bach was hilarious!). Also, love your avatar.
